title: Detroit Tigers average ticket price 2006 to 2019
yAxis: Average ticket price in U.S. dollars
summary: This is a line chart with an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Average ticket price in U.S. dollars, containing a total of 13 data points.
In general Average ticket price in U.S. dollars has rose over the Year.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2010 and 2011.
The highest Average ticket price in U.S. dollars, of value 31.0 was reached at Year 2012
Minimum Average ticket price in U.S. dollars about 18.48 was reached at Year 2006
